item.title: Privacy & Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy for specific Apps ICalSync app QuickReplies app NGOmetrics app We collect your information only with your consent; we only collect the minimum amount of information that is necessary to operate our software and services; we don‘t sell or share your information with anyone else.

item.title: Privacy & Policy
item.description: In Short We do not store your data (inputs, clicks). It stays on Google’s servers.

item.title: Privacy & Policy
item.description: Why is my information needed? NGOmetrics is a web based product; because of this they may require the use of first and last names, billing contact information, and a Google account as a login.

item.title: Privacy & Policy
item.description: In Short We do not store your data (inputs, clicks). It stays on Google’s servers.

item.title: Terms & Condition
item.description: Terms and Conditions These terms and conditions (“Agreement”) sets forth the general terms and conditions of your use of the “ICalSync” application (“Application”, “Service”, “App”, or “Add-on”) and any of its related products and services (collectively, “Services”).

item.title: Terms & Condition
item.description: Terms and Conditions These terms and conditions (“Agreement”) sets forth the general terms and conditions of your use of the “NGOmetrics” application (“Application”, “Service”, “App”, or “Add-on”) and any of its related products and services (collectively, “Services”).

item.title: Terms & Condition
item.description: Terms and Conditions These terms and conditions (“Agreement”) sets forth the general terms and conditions of your use of the “QuickReplies” application (“Application”, “Service”, “App”, or “Add-on”) and any of its related products and services (collectively, “Services”).

item.title: Terms of Service
item.description: We take all measures reasonably necessary to protect User Personal Information from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction; maintain data accuracy, and help ensure the appropriate use of User Personal Information.
